cast.overview: Forced out of their apartment due to dangerous works on a neighboring building, Emad and Rana move into a new flat in the center of Tehran. An incident linked to the previous tenant will dramatically change the young couple’s life.
cast.title: The Salesman

details.biography: Mina Sadati is an actress who was born in 1981 in Kashan, Iran. She has been nominated three times for the Best Supporting Actress and Best Actress from Fajr Film Festival for "Ice Age," "Mina's Choice" and "Hot Summer". She entered to cinema world by "Eve's Shoulder Wound" by Hossein Ghenat. Among the cinematic works of Mina Sadati Maziar Miri's "Saadat Abad", Asghar Farhadi's "Seller", Parviz Shahbazi's "Karat 14", and Manji Baghbani's "Kharguish" can be named.
details.name: Mina Sadati
